title: Phase 3: Epics and parent-child relationships
description:
## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Add `ParentID` field to Issue model
- [ ] Add `--parent` flag to `work create`
- [ ] Add `work link <child-id> --parent <epic-id>` command
- [ ] Add `work unlink <child-id>` command
- [ ] Validate: parent must exist, no circular refs, single-level
      only (no grandchildren)
- [ ] `work show <id>` displays children + completion stats when
      issue has children
- [ ] Add `--parent <id>` filter to `work list`
- [ ] Add `--roots` filter to `work list` (no parent)
- [ ] Tests for linking, validation, display, filtering

## Context
Part of: Issue tracker personas & workflows
Depends on: Phase 2
